review.text: The first, best season of Aqua Teen Hunger Force — Cartoon Network's late-night slacker burlesque about three Jersey roommates who happen to be sentient food products — was mind-spanking randomness, rooted in faultless character reality. The subsequent seasons have been a descent into synapse-snapping madness. Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters turns that madness to full-on seizure. The plot can't be summarized: Let's just say that crazy s--- happens, and occasionally, you laugh.
